subject: English
otherExamName: [বন রিসার্চ অফিসার-০৫, সহকারী পরিচালক (মাদক) ও কারা তত্ত্ববাবধায়ক-০৬] ১৩তম প্রভাষক নিবন্ধন-১৬]
question: 'A bolt from the blue' means __
description:
A bolt from the blue an unexpected calamity-অপ্রত্যাশিত বা আকস্মিক বিপদ বা বিপর্যয়, বিনামেঘে বজ্রপাত

at stake – endangered, বিপন্ন, সংকটাপন্ন। at stake হচ্ছে এমন পরিস্থিতি যখন মূল্যবান কিছু হারিয়ে যেতে পারে

A bed of roses = A life only of joy and happiness, পুষ্পশয্যা অর্থাৎ শুধু সুখ উল্লাসের জীবন।

Aware of contrary things = ambivalent, একই সাথে দুইটি বিপরীতধর্মী অনুভুতি বিদ্যমান থাকে এমন ।

Acid test = real test, সত্যিকার পরীক্ষা, অগ্নিপরীক্ষা ; All in all = all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বময় ক্ষমতাধর

at one go = at one attempt, একবারের চেষ্টায় বা প্রচেষ্টায় ; (not) at all – মোটেই (না, নয়)

At stone's throw = at a short distance, খুবই নিকটে ; At/from the outset – প্রারম্ভে, শুরুতেই ।

At a low ebb = Decreasing, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান ; All at once = Suddenly, হঠাৎ করে বা আকস্মিকভাবে। অবাধে মুক্তভাবে;

at bottom - in reality, বাস্তবে, প্রকৃতপক্ষে, ভেতরে ভেতরে

Some Important Idioms

ABC (primary/elementary knowledge, প্রাথমিক জ্ঞান) He doesn't know even the ABC of music

A bolt from the blue (something quite unexpected, an unexpected calamity, আকস্মিক ঘটনা, বিনা মেঘে বজ্রপাত) The news of his father's death came to him as a bolt from the blue.

Above board (honest and legal, ন্যায় ও বৈধ) His activities are open and above board.

Above all (more than anything else, সর্বোপরি) Above all, be careful of your health.
Achilles heel (small fault/weak point causing -- fall, ছোটখাটো কিন্তু পতন ঘটাতে পারে এমন দুর্বলতা) A misbehaving minister is regarded as a government's Achilles heel and is expected to resign

After all (in spite of everything, সব কিছু সত্ত্বেও) After all, he is a patriot.

All at once (suddenly, হঠাৎ) All at once a tiger came out of the forest.

All on (of) a sudden (suddenly,হঠাৎ) All on (of) a sudden a tiger came out of the bush.

All but (nearly, almost , প্রায়) The party was all but over when we arrived.

All in all (supreme, all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বোচ্চ কর্তৃত্ববান) Mr Sen is all in all in his office.



All in a row (continuously, একটানা) I read ten of Dicken's all in a row.

Above one's means (beyond one's income, আয়ের অধিক ব্যয় করে জীবনযাপন করা) A scrupulous (বিবেক) person does not live above his/her means.

Above one's station (beyond one's ability etc, পদমর্যাদার বাইরে) He will try his best but the post is above his station.

Advanced in life (aged/old, বৃদ্ধ) Though he is not much advanced in life, he is experienced.

All and sundry (all people, সবাই, সকল) He invited all and sundry to his father's funeral.

All over with (ruined, সর্বস্বান্ত) It is all over with the old man.

Against the grain (beyond one's will, অনিচ্ছায়) He agreed with her to the proposal against the grain.

An apple of discord (matter of dispute, bone of contention, subject of quarrel, ঝগড়া/বিবাদের  কারণ) The paternal property has become an apple of discord between the two brothers.

As if (as it would be, যেন) He swims so beautifully as if he were the water-god.

As it were (like, যেন) The sun is, as it were, the lamp of the universe.



As a rule (usually, routinely, নিয়মমাফিক) He goes to bed at 10 p.m. as a rule.

As usual (habitually, usually, যথারীতি, বরাবরের মতো) He was late/ the last to arrive as usual.

As like as two peas in a pod (exactly alike, একই বৃন্তে দুটি ফুল) The friendship between the two boys are as like as two peas in a pod.

As the crow flies (direct,সোজাসুজি) The station is three miles away from here as the crow flies.

At a low ebb (declining, decreasing, falling, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান) His fame is at a low ebb now.

At a pinch (in case of emergency, জরুরি অবস্থায়) This amount will do at a pinch.

At a round rate (at the fixed price, নির্ধারিত মূল্যে) Things are selling in the shop at a round rate.

At a standstill (নিশ্চল, অচলাবস্থায়) The discussion is now at a standstill.

At a stretch (without break, with one effort, বিরতিহীনভাবে, একটানা) He can run ten miles at a stretch.

At all hazards (in the face of all difficulties, শত বাধাবিপত্তি সত্ত্বেও) I'll support your opinion at all hazards.


At any rate (at any cost, যেকোনো উপায়ে) she must come at any rate before 5 p.m.
At bottom (really, প্রকৃতপক্ষে; at the core,ভেতরে ভেতরে) Though he looks cruel, he is kind at bottom
At the bottom of (at the top of,শীর্ষে) The boy shouted at the bottom of his voice.
At dead of night (at midnight, গভীর রাতে)) The police caught the thief at dead of night. 

At all (primarily,আদৌ, মোটেই) He doesn't know French at all. He is not at all a good man.
At all events (in all cases,যাহাই ঘটুক সব ক্ষেত্রেই, সর্বাবস্থায়) I shall stand by him at all events.
At arm's length (at a distance, দূরে) Try to keep the bad boy at arm's length.
At cross purposes (misunderstanding each other and talking different subjects, কোন বিষয় না বুঝে পরস্পরকে ভুল বোঝাবুঝি অবস্থায় ভিন্ন বিষয়ে আলোচনা করা) They are arguing at a cross purposes.
At bay (in a tight corner,কোণঠাসা, প্রাণবাঁচানোর জন্য সংগ্রামরত) The tiger was at bay in the bush.
At daggers drawn (In a state of violent enmity/hostility, on the point of fighting,খড়গহস্ত,ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা) The two brothers are now at daggers drawn.



At home (skilled, ; familiar with,খুব ভালো জ্ঞানসম্পন্ন) He is quite at home in Mathematics.
At home (comfortable, relaxed, নিজের বাড়ির মতো আরামপ্রদ) I feel at home in your house.
At large (free, অবাধ, মুক্ত) The anti-socials are still at large. সমাজ বিরোধীরা এখনো ধরা ছোঁয়ার বাইরে
At large (as a whole, in general,সর্বোপরি, মোটকথা ) He is popular with the people at large.
At last/At long last (in the long run, finally, অবশেষে ) I got my missing book at last.
At least (at the lowest, অন্তত) At least one hundred boys will come to school today.
At fault/At a loss/At one's wits' end (puzzled, perplexed, bewildered, confused,হতবুদ্ধি, বিভ্রান্ত, কিংকর্তব্যবিমূঢ়) He was at fault/at a loss/at his wits' end and did not know what to do/say.
At one's discretion (according to one's decision/wishes-কারো সিদ্ধান্ত/মর্জি/ইচ্ছামাফিক) Bail is granted at the discretion of the court. (আদালতের স্বেচ্ছাধীন ক্ষমতায় জামিন মঞ্জুর হয়)

At one's own sweet will (according to his wishes, খুশি মতো ) He does it at his own sweet will.
At one's elbow (close at hand, পাশে, নিকটে) I am at your elbow in your all troubles.


At one's heels (close behind, পায়ে পায়ে) We followed him at his heels.
At one's finger ends/tips (ready at hand, নখদর্পণে) All these facts are at his finger ends.
At one's beck and call (obedient, under one's absolute control, আজ্ঞাবহ, ডাকলেই পাওয়া যায় এমন হুকুমের তাবেদার, অন্যের আদেশ পালনে প্রস্তুত ) He is always at my beck and call.
At random (aimlessly, indiscriminately, by chance, এলোপাথাড়িভাবে, এলোমেলোভাবে) He hit the ball at random. The police fired into the crowd at random. The winners will be chosen at random

At sixes and sevens (scattered, in disorder, in confusion, not well organized, বিশৃঙ্খলা অবস্থায়) All the furniture in the room were at sixes and sevens.
At stake (at risk, in danger, in jeopardy, বিপন্ন, ঝুঁকিপূর্ণ) His life is at stake now.
At sea (perplexed, confused, বিভ্রান্ত, হতবুদ্ধি, হাবুডুবু খাওয়া) I am quite at sea in English
At the eleventh hour (at the last possible moment/time, just in time, almost too late, শেষ মুহুর্তে) The doctor come to the patient at the eleventh hour.
At the outset (in the beginning, শুরুতেই) The marathon runner stumbled at the outset of the race
At times (occasionally, মাঝে মাঝে) At times he loses his temper. মাঝে মাঝে সে রেগে যায়।
Average person (common men, জনসাধারণ) An average person reads a book only for pleasure.

subject: English
question: "At draggers drawn" means __
description:
At daggers drawn = In a state of violent enmity/ hostility, on the point of fighting-দা-কুমড়া সম্পর্ক, শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থায়, ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা,পরস্পরের প্রতি রাগান্বিত, বৈরী সম্পর্ক, পরস্পরের প্রতি রাগান্বিত, বৈরী সম্পর্ক।

Apple of discord = Object of dispute/quarrel, bone of contention = বিবাদ বা ঝগড়ার বিষয়বস্তু ,

Apple of one's eye = extremely favourite = অত্যন্ত প্রিয়, নয়নের মণি।

Absolute Zero = সর্বনিম্ন তাপমাত্রা, চরম ডিগ্রী, যে তাপমাত্রায় তাপ সঞ্চারী বস্তুকণা সম্পূর্ণ নিশ্চল অবস্থায় থাকে।

A bolt from the blue an unexpected calamity-অপ্রত্যাশিত বা আকস্মিক বিপদ বা বিপর্যয়, বিনামেঘে বজ্রপাত

at stake – endangered, বিপন্ন, সংকটাপন্ন। at stake হচ্ছে এমন পরিস্থিতি যখন মূল্যবান কিছু হারিয়ে যেতে পারে

A bed of roses = A life only of joy and happiness, পুষ্পশয্যা অর্থাৎ শুধু সুখ উল্লাসের জীবন।

Aware of contrary things = ambivalent, একই সাথে দুইটি বিপরীতধর্মী অনুভুতি বিদ্যমান থাকে এমন ।

Acid test = real test, সত্যিকার পরীক্ষা, অগ্নিপরীক্ষা ; All in all = all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বময় ক্ষমতাধর

at one go = at one attempt, একবারের চেষ্টায় বা প্রচেষ্টায় ; (not) at all – মোটেই (না, নয়)

At stone's throw = at a short distance, খুবই নিকটে ; At/from the outset – প্রারম্ভে, শুরুতেই ।

At a low ebb = Decreasing, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান ; All at once = Suddenly, হঠাৎ করে বা আকস্মিকভাবে। অবাধে মুক্তভাবে;

subject: English
question: 'At daggers drawn' means__
option_01: In a state of violent enmity
description:
At daggers drawn = In a state of violent enmity/ hostility, on the point of fighting-দা-কুমড়া সম্পর্ক, শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থায়, ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা,পরস্পরের প্রতি রাগান্বিত, বৈরী সম্পর্ক, পরস্পরের প্রতি রাগান্বিত, বৈরী সম্পর্ক।

Apple of discord = Object of dispute/quarrel, bone of contention = বিবাদ বা ঝগড়ার বিষয়বস্তু ,

Apple of one's eye = extremely favourite = অত্যন্ত প্রিয়, নয়নের মণি।

Absolute Zero = সর্বনিম্ন তাপমাত্রা, চরম ডিগ্রী, যে তাপমাত্রায় তাপ সঞ্চারী বস্তুকণা সম্পূর্ণ নিশ্চল অবস্থায় থাকে।

A bolt from the blue an unexpected calamity-অপ্রত্যাশিত বা আকস্মিক বিপদ বা বিপর্যয়, বিনামেঘে বজ্রপাত

at stake – endangered, বিপন্ন, সংকটাপন্ন। at stake হচ্ছে এমন পরিস্থিতি যখন মূল্যবান কিছু হারিয়ে যেতে পারে

A bed of roses = A life only of joy and happiness, পুষ্পশয্যা অর্থাৎ শুধু সুখ উল্লাসের জীবন।

Aware of contrary things = ambivalent, একই সাথে দুইটি বিপরীতধর্মী অনুভুতি বিদ্যমান থাকে এমন ।

Acid test = real test, সত্যিকার পরীক্ষা, অগ্নিপরীক্ষা ; All in all = all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বময় ক্ষমতাধর

at one go = at one attempt, একবারের চেষ্টায় বা প্রচেষ্টায় ; (not) at all – মোটেই (না, নয়)

At stone's throw = at a short distance, খুবই নিকটে ; At/from the outset – প্রারম্ভে, শুরুতেই ।

At a low ebb = Decreasing, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান ; All at once = Suddenly, হঠাৎ করে বা আকস্মিকভাবে। অবাধে মুক্তভাবে;

at bottom - in reality, বাস্তবে, প্রকৃতপক্ষে, ভেতরে ভেতরে

Some Important Idioms

ABC (primary/elementary knowledge, প্রাথমিক জ্ঞান) He doesn't know even the ABC of music

A bolt from the blue (something quite unexpected, an unexpected calamity, আকস্মিক ঘটনা, বিনা মেঘে বজ্রপাত) The news of his father's death came to him as a bolt from the blue.

Above board (honest and legal, ন্যায় ও বৈধ) His activities are open and above board.

Above all (more than anything else, সর্বোপরি) Above all, be careful of your health.
Achilles heel (small fault/weak point causing -- fall, ছোটখাটো কিন্তু পতন ঘটাতে পারে এমন দুর্বলতা) A misbehaving minister is regarded as a government's Achilles heel and is expected to resign

After all (in spite of everything, সব কিছু সত্ত্বেও) After all, he is a patriot.

All at once (suddenly, হঠাৎ) All at once a tiger came out of the forest.

All on (of) a sudden (suddenly,হঠাৎ) All on (of) a sudden a tiger came out of the bush.

All but (nearly, almost , প্রায়) The party was all but over when we arrived.

All in all (supreme, all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বোচ্চ কর্তৃত্ববান) Mr Sen is all in all in his office.



All in a row (continuously, একটানা) I read ten of Dicken's all in a row.

Above one's means (beyond one's income, আয়ের অধিক ব্যয় করে জীবনযাপন করা) A scrupulous (বিবেক) person does not live above his/her means.

Above one's station (beyond one's ability etc, পদমর্যাদার বাইরে) He will try his best but the post is above his station.

Advanced in life (aged/old, বৃদ্ধ) Though he is not much advanced in life, he is experienced.

All and sundry (all people, সবাই, সকল) He invited all and sundry to his father's funeral.

All over with (ruined, সর্বস্বান্ত) It is all over with the old man.

Against the grain (beyond one's will, অনিচ্ছায়) He agreed with her to the proposal against the grain.

An apple of discord (matter of dispute, bone of contention, subject of quarrel, ঝগড়া/বিবাদের  কারণ) The paternal property has become an apple of discord between the two brothers.

As if (as it would be, যেন) He swims so beautifully as if he were the water-god.

As it were (like, যেন) The sun is, as it were, the lamp of the universe.



As a rule (usually, routinely, নিয়মমাফিক) He goes to bed at 10 p.m. as a rule.

As usual (habitually, usually, যথারীতি, বরাবরের মতো) He was late/ the last to arrive as usual.

As like as two peas in a pod (exactly alike, একই বৃন্তে দুটি ফুল) The friendship between the two boys are as like as two peas in a pod.

As the crow flies (direct,সোজাসুজি) The station is three miles away from here as the crow flies.

At a low ebb (declining, decreasing, falling, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান) His fame is at a low ebb now.

At a pinch (in case of emergency, জরুরি অবস্থায়) This amount will do at a pinch.

At a round rate (at the fixed price, নির্ধারিত মূল্যে) Things are selling in the shop at a round rate.

At a standstill (নিশ্চল, অচলাবস্থায়) The discussion is now at a standstill.

At a stretch (without break, with one effort, বিরতিহীনভাবে, একটানা) He can run ten miles at a stretch.

At all hazards (in the face of all difficulties, শত বাধাবিপত্তি সত্ত্বেও) I'll support your opinion at all hazards.


At any rate (at any cost, যেকোনো উপায়ে) she must come at any rate before 5 p.m.
At bottom (really, প্রকৃতপক্ষে; at the core,ভেতরে ভেতরে) Though he looks cruel, he is kind at bottom
At the bottom of (at the top of,শীর্ষে) The boy shouted at the bottom of his voice.
At dead of night (at midnight, গভীর রাতে)) The police caught the thief at dead of night. 

At all (primarily,আদৌ, মোটেই) He doesn't know French at all. He is not at all a good man.
At all events (in all cases,যাহাই ঘটুক সব ক্ষেত্রেই, সর্বাবস্থায়) I shall stand by him at all events.
At arm's length (at a distance, দূরে) Try to keep the bad boy at arm's length.
At cross purposes (misunderstanding each other and talking different subjects, কোন বিষয় না বুঝে পরস্পরকে ভুল বোঝাবুঝি অবস্থায় ভিন্ন বিষয়ে আলোচনা করা) They are arguing at a cross purposes.
At bay (in a tight corner,কোণঠাসা, প্রাণবাঁচানোর জন্য সংগ্রামরত) The tiger was at bay in the bush.
At daggers drawn (In a state of violent enmity/hostility, on the point of fighting,খড়গহস্ত,ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা) The two brothers are now at daggers drawn.



At home (skilled, ; familiar with,খুব ভালো জ্ঞানসম্পন্ন) He is quite at home in Mathematics.
At home (comfortable, relaxed, নিজের বাড়ির মতো আরামপ্রদ) I feel at home in your house.
At large (free, অবাধ, মুক্ত) The anti-socials are still at large. সমাজ বিরোধীরা এখনো ধরা ছোঁয়ার বাইরে
At large (as a whole, in general,সর্বোপরি, মোটকথা ) He is popular with the people at large.
At last/At long last (in the long run, finally, অবশেষে ) I got my missing book at last.
At least (at the lowest, অন্তত) At least one hundred boys will come to school today.
At fault/At a loss/At one's wits' end (puzzled, perplexed, bewildered, confused,হতবুদ্ধি, বিভ্রান্ত, কিংকর্তব্যবিমূঢ়) He was at fault/at a loss/at his wits' end and did not know what to do/say.
At one's discretion (according to one's decision/wishes-কারো সিদ্ধান্ত/মর্জি/ইচ্ছামাফিক) Bail is granted at the discretion of the court. (আদালতের স্বেচ্ছাধীন ক্ষমতায় জামিন মঞ্জুর হয়)

At one's own sweet will (according to his wishes, খুশি মতো ) He does it at his own sweet will.
At one's elbow (close at hand, পাশে, নিকটে) I am at your elbow in your all troubles.


At one's heels (close behind, পায়ে পায়ে) We followed him at his heels.
At one's finger ends/tips (ready at hand, নখদর্পণে) All these facts are at his finger ends.
At one's beck and call (obedient, under one's absolute control, আজ্ঞাবহ, ডাকলেই পাওয়া যায় এমন হুকুমের তাবেদার, অন্যের আদেশ পালনে প্রস্তুত ) He is always at my beck and call.
At random (aimlessly, indiscriminately, by chance, এলোপাথাড়িভাবে, এলোমেলোভাবে) He hit the ball at random. The police fired into the crowd at random. The winners will be chosen at random

At sixes and sevens (scattered, in disorder, in confusion, not well organized, বিশৃঙ্খলা অবস্থায়) All the furniture in the room were at sixes and sevens.
At stake (at risk, in danger, in jeopardy, বিপন্ন, ঝুঁকিপূর্ণ) His life is at stake now.
At sea (perplexed, confused, বিভ্রান্ত, হতবুদ্ধি, হাবুডুবু খাওয়া) I am quite at sea in English
At the eleventh hour (at the last possible moment/time, just in time, almost too late, শেষ মুহুর্তে) The doctor come to the patient at the eleventh hour.
At the outset (in the beginning, শুরুতেই) The marathon runner stumbled at the outset of the race
At times (occasionally, মাঝে মাঝে) At times he loses his temper. মাঝে মাঝে সে রেগে যায়।
Average person (common men, জনসাধারণ) An average person reads a book only for pleasure.

At large (free, অবাধ, মুক্ত) The anti-socials are still at large. সমাজ বিরোধীরা এখনো ধরা ছোঁয়ার বাইরে
At large (as a whole, in general,সর্বোপরি, মোটকথা ) He is popular with the people at large.
At last/At long last (in the long run, finally, অবশেষে ) I got my missing book at last.
At least (at the lowest, অন্তত) At least one hundred boys will come to school today.
At fault/At a loss/At one's wits' end (puzzled, perplexed, bewildered, confused,হতবুদ্ধি, বিভ্রান্ত, কিংকর্তব্যবিমূঢ়) He was at fault/at a loss/at his wits' end and did not know what to do/say.
At one's discretion (according to one's decision/wishes-কারো সিদ্ধান্ত/মর্জি/ইচ্ছামাফিক) Bail is granted at the discretion of the court. (আদালতের স্বেচ্ছাধীন ক্ষমতায় জামিন মঞ্জুর হয়)

At one's own sweet will (according to his wishes, খুশি মতো ) He does it at his own sweet will.
At one's elbow (close at hand, পাশে, নিকটে) I am at your elbow in your all troubles.


At one's heels (close behind, পায়ে পায়ে) We followed him at his heels.
At one's finger ends/tips (ready at hand, নখদর্পণে) All these facts are at his finger ends.
At one's beck and call (obedient, under one's absolute control, আজ্ঞাবহ, ডাকলেই পাওয়া যায় এমন হুকুমের তাবেদার, অন্যের আদেশ পালনে প্রস্তুত ) He is always at my beck and call.
At random (aimlessly, indiscriminately, by chance, এলোপাথাড়িভাবে, এলোমেলোভাবে) He hit the ball at random. The police fired into the crowd at random. The winners will be chosen at random

At sixes and sevens (scattered, in disorder, in confusion, not well organized, বিশৃঙ্খলা অবস্থায়) All the furniture in the room were at sixes and sevens.
At stake (at risk, in danger, in jeopardy, বিপন্ন, ঝুঁকিপূর্ণ) His life is at stake now.
At sea (perplexed, confused, বিভ্রান্ত, হতবুদ্ধি, হাবুডুবু খাওয়া) I am quite at sea in English
At the eleventh hour (at the last possible moment/time, just in time, almost too late, শেষ মুহুর্তে) The doctor come to the patient at the eleventh hour.
At the outset (in the beginning, শুরুতেই) The marathon runner stumbled at the outset of the race
At times (occasionally, মাঝে মাঝে) At times he loses his temper. মাঝে মাঝে সে রেগে যায়।
Average person (common men, জনসাধারণ) An average person reads a book only for pleasure.

subject: English
question: The winners will be selected __at random__.
description:
at random = indiscriminate, aimlessly, by chance, accidentally, এলোপাথাড়িভাবে, দৈবক্রমে

snail = শামুক; pace = গতি ; at a snail's pace = extremely/very slowly, খুব ধীরগতিতে, শম্বুকগতিতে

At daggers drawn = In a state of violent enmity/ hostility, on the point of fighting-দা-কুমড়া সম্পর্ক, শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থায়, ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা,পরস্পরের প্রতি রাগান্বিত, বৈরী সম্পর্ক, পরস্পরের প্রতি রাগান্বিত, বৈরী সম্পর্ক।

Apple of discord = Object of dispute/quarrel, bone of contention = বিবাদ বা ঝগড়ার বিষয়বস্তু ,

Apple of one's eye = extremely favourite = অত্যন্ত প্রিয়, নয়নের মণি।

Absolute Zero = সর্বনিম্ন তাপমাত্রা, চরম ডিগ্রী, যে তাপমাত্রায় তাপ সঞ্চারী বস্তুকণা সম্পূর্ণ নিশ্চল অবস্থায় থাকে।

A bolt from the blue an unexpected calamity-অপ্রত্যাশিত বা আকস্মিক বিপদ বা বিপর্যয়, বিনামেঘে বজ্রপাত

at stake – endangered, বিপন্ন, সংকটাপন্ন। at stake হচ্ছে এমন পরিস্থিতি যখন মূল্যবান কিছু হারিয়ে যেতে পারে

A bed of roses = A life only of joy and happiness, পুষ্পশয্যা অর্থাৎ শুধু সুখ উল্লাসের জীবন।

Aware of contrary things = ambivalent, একই সাথে দুইটি বিপরীতধর্মী অনুভুতি বিদ্যমান থাকে এমন ।

Acid test = real test, সত্যিকার পরীক্ষা, অগ্নিপরীক্ষা ; All in all = all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বময় ক্ষমতাধর

at one go = at one attempt, একবারের চেষ্টায় বা প্রচেষ্টায় ; (not) at all – মোটেই (না, নয়)

At a low ebb = Decreasing, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান ; All at once = Suddenly, হঠাৎ করে বা আকস্মিকভাবে। অবাধে মুক্তভাবে;

Some Important Idioms

ABC (primary/elementary knowledge, প্রাথমিক জ্ঞান) He doesn't know even the ABC of music

A bolt from the blue (something quite unexpected, an unexpected calamity, আকস্মিক ঘটনা, বিনা মেঘে বজ্রপাত) The news of his father's death came to him as a bolt from the blue.

Above board (honest and legal, ন্যায় ও বৈধ) His activities are open and above board.

Above all (more than anything else, সর্বোপরি) Above all, be careful of your health.
Achilles heel (small fault/weak point causing -- fall, ছোটখাটো কিন্তু পতন ঘটাতে পারে এমন দুর্বলতা) A misbehaving minister is regarded as a government's Achilles heel and is expected to resign

After all (in spite of everything, সব কিছু সত্ত্বেও) After all, he is a patriot.

All at once (suddenly, হঠাৎ) All at once a tiger came out of the forest.

All on (of) a sudden (suddenly,হঠাৎ) All on (of) a sudden a tiger came out of the bush.

All but (nearly, almost , প্রায়) The party was all but over when we arrived.

All in all (supreme, all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বোচ্চ কর্তৃত্ববান) Mr Sen is all in all in his office.



All in a row (continuously, একটানা) I read ten of Dicken's all in a row.

Above one's means (beyond one's income, আয়ের অধিক ব্যয় করে জীবনযাপন করা) A scrupulous (বিবেক) person does not live above his/her means.

Above one's station (beyond one's ability etc, পদমর্যাদার বাইরে) He will try his best but the post is above his station.

Advanced in life (aged/old, বৃদ্ধ) Though he is not much advanced in life, he is experienced.

All and sundry (all people, সবাই, সকল) He invited all and sundry to his father's funeral.

All over with (ruined, সর্বস্বান্ত) It is all over with the old man.

Against the grain (beyond one's will, অনিচ্ছায়) He agreed with her to the proposal against the grain.

An apple of discord (matter of dispute, bone of contention, subject of quarrel, ঝগড়া/বিবাদের  কারণ) The paternal property has become an apple of discord between the two brothers.

As if (as it would be, যেন) He swims so beautifully as if he were the water-god.

As it were (like, যেন) The sun is, as it were, the lamp of the universe.



As a rule (usually, routinely, নিয়মমাফিক) He goes to bed at 10 p.m. as a rule.

As usual (habitually, usually, যথারীতি, বরাবরের মতো) He was late/ the last to arrive as usual.

As like as two peas in a pod (exactly alike, একই বৃন্তে দুটি ফুল) The friendship between the two boys are as like as two peas in a pod.

As the crow flies (direct,সোজাসুজি) The station is three miles away from here as the crow flies.

At a low ebb (declining, decreasing, falling, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান) His fame is at a low ebb now.

At a pinch (in case of emergency, জরুরি অবস্থায়) This amount will do at a pinch.

At a round rate (at the fixed price, নির্ধারিত মূল্যে) Things are selling in the shop at a round rate.

At a standstill (নিশ্চল, অচলাবস্থায়) The discussion is now at a standstill.

At a stretch (without break, with one effort, বিরতিহীনভাবে, একটানা) He can run ten miles at a stretch.

At all hazards (in the face of all difficulties, শত বাধাবিপত্তি সত্ত্বেও) I'll support your opinion at all hazards.


At any rate (at any cost, যেকোনো উপায়ে) she must come at any rate before 5 p.m.
At bottom (really, প্রকৃতপক্ষে; at the core,ভেতরে ভেতরে) Though he looks cruel, he is kind at bottom
At the bottom of (at the top of,শীর্ষে) The boy shouted at the bottom of his voice.
At dead of night (at midnight, গভীর রাতে)) The police caught the thief at dead of night. 

At all (primarily,আদৌ, মোটেই) He doesn't know French at all. He is not at all a good man.
At all events (in all cases,যাহাই ঘটুক সব ক্ষেত্রেই, সর্বাবস্থায়) I shall stand by him at all events.
At arm's length (at a distance, দূরে) Try to keep the bad boy at arm's length.
At cross purposes (misunderstanding each other and talking different subjects, কোন বিষয় না বুঝে পরস্পরকে ভুল বোঝাবুঝি অবস্থায় ভিন্ন বিষয়ে আলোচনা করা) They are arguing at a cross purposes.
At bay (in a tight corner,কোণঠাসা, প্রাণবাঁচানোর জন্য সংগ্রামরত) The tiger was at bay in the bush.
At daggers drawn (In a state of violent enmity/hostility, on the point of fighting,খড়গহস্ত,ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা) The two brothers are now at daggers drawn.



At home (skilled, ; familiar with,খুব ভালো জ্ঞানসম্পন্ন) He is quite at home in Mathematics.
At home (comfortable, relaxed, নিজের বাড়ির মতো আরামপ্রদ) I feel at home in your house.
At large (free, অবাধ, মুক্ত) The anti-socials are still at large. সমাজ বিরোধীরা এখনো ধরা ছোঁয়ার বাইরে
At large (as a whole, in general,সর্বোপরি, মোটকথা ) He is popular with the people at large.
At last/At long last (in the long run, finally, অবশেষে ) I got my missing book at last.
At least (at the lowest, অন্তত) At least one hundred boys will come to school today.
At fault/At a loss/At one's wits' end (puzzled, perplexed, bewildered, confused,হতবুদ্ধি, বিভ্রান্ত, কিংকর্তব্যবিমূঢ়) He was at fault/at a loss/at his wits' end and did not know what to do/say.
At one's discretion (according to one's decision/wishes-কারো সিদ্ধান্ত/মর্জি/ইচ্ছামাফিক) Bail is granted at the discretion of the court. (আদালতের স্বেচ্ছাধীন ক্ষমতায় জামিন মঞ্জুর হয়)

At one's own sweet will (according to his wishes, খুশি মতো ) He does it at his own sweet will.
At one's elbow (close at hand, পাশে, নিকটে) I am at your elbow in your all troubles.


At one's heels (close behind, পায়ে পায়ে) We followed him at his heels.
At one's finger ends/tips (ready at hand, নখদর্পণে) All these facts are at his finger ends.
At one's beck and call (obedient, under one's absolute control, আজ্ঞাবহ, ডাকলেই পাওয়া যায় এমন হুকুমের তাবেদার, অন্যের আদেশ পালনে প্রস্তুত ) He is always at my beck and call.
At random (aimlessly, indiscriminately, by chance, এলোপাথাড়িভাবে, এলোমেলোভাবে) He hit the ball at random. The police fired into the crowd at random. The winners will be chosen at random

At sixes and sevens (scattered, in disorder, in confusion, not well organized, বিশৃঙ্খলা অবস্থায়) All the furniture in the room were at sixes and sevens.
At stake (at risk, in danger, in jeopardy, বিপন্ন, ঝুঁকিপূর্ণ) His life is at stake now.
At sea (perplexed, confused, বিভ্রান্ত, হতবুদ্ধি, হাবুডুবু খাওয়া) I am quite at sea in English
At the eleventh hour (at the last possible moment/time, just in time, almost too late, শেষ মুহুর্তে) The doctor come to the patient at the eleventh hour.
At the outset (in the beginning, শুরুতেই) The marathon runner stumbled at the outset of the race
At times (occasionally, মাঝে মাঝে) At times he loses his temper. মাঝে মাঝে সে রেগে যায়।
Average person (common men, জনসাধারণ) An average person reads a book only for pleasure.

Above one's means (beyond one's income, আয়ের অধিক ব্যয় করে জীবনযাপন করা) A scrupulous (বিবেক) person does not live above his/her means.

Above one's station (beyond one's ability etc, পদমর্যাদার বাইরে) He will try his best but the post is above his station.

Advanced in life (aged/old, বৃদ্ধ) Though he is not much advanced in life, he is experienced.

All and sundry (all people, সবাই, সকল) He invited all and sundry to his father's funeral.

All over with (ruined, সর্বস্বান্ত) It is all over with the old man.

Against the grain (beyond one's will, অনিচ্ছায়) He agreed with her to the proposal against the grain.

An apple of discord (matter of dispute, bone of contention, subject of quarrel, ঝগড়া/বিবাদের  কারণ) The paternal property has become an apple of discord between the two brothers.

As if (as it would be, যেন) He swims so beautifully as if he were the water-god.

As it were (like, যেন) The sun is, as it were, the lamp of the universe.



As a rule (usually, routinely, নিয়মমাফিক) He goes to bed at 10 p.m. as a rule.

As usual (habitually, usually, যথারীতি, বরাবরের মতো) He was late/ the last to arrive as usual.

As like as two peas in a pod (exactly alike, একই বৃন্তে দুটি ফুল) The friendship between the two boys are as like as two peas in a pod.

As the crow flies (direct,সোজাসুজি) The station is three miles away from here as the crow flies.

At a low ebb (declining, decreasing, falling, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান) His fame is at a low ebb now.

At a pinch (in case of emergency, জরুরি অবস্থায়) This amount will do at a pinch.

At a round rate (at the fixed price, নির্ধারিত মূল্যে) Things are selling in the shop at a round rate.

At a standstill (নিশ্চল, অচলাবস্থায়) The discussion is now at a standstill.

At a stretch (without break, with one effort, বিরতিহীনভাবে, একটানা) He can run ten miles at a stretch.

At all hazards (in the face of all difficulties, শত বাধাবিপত্তি সত্ত্বেও) I'll support your opinion at all hazards.


At any rate (at any cost, যেকোনো উপায়ে) she must come at any rate before 5 p.m.
At bottom (really, প্রকৃতপক্ষে; at the core,ভেতরে ভেতরে) Though he looks cruel, he is kind at bottom
At the bottom of (at the top of,শীর্ষে) The boy shouted at the bottom of his voice.
At dead of night (at midnight, গভীর রাতে)) The police caught the thief at dead of night. 

At all (primarily,আদৌ, মোটেই) He doesn't know French at all. He is not at all a good man.
At all events (in all cases,যাহাই ঘটুক সব ক্ষেত্রেই, সর্বাবস্থায়) I shall stand by him at all events.
At arm's length (at a distance, দূরে) Try to keep the bad boy at arm's length.
At cross purposes (misunderstanding each other and talking different subjects, কোন বিষয় না বুঝে পরস্পরকে ভুল বোঝাবুঝি অবস্থায় ভিন্ন বিষয়ে আলোচনা করা) They are arguing at a cross purposes.
At bay (in a tight corner,কোণঠাসা, প্রাণবাঁচানোর জন্য সংগ্রামরত) The tiger was at bay in the bush.
At daggers drawn (In a state of violent enmity/hostility, on the point of fighting,খড়গহস্ত,ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা) The two brothers are now at daggers drawn.



At home (skilled, ; familiar with,খুব ভালো জ্ঞানসম্পন্ন) He is quite at home in Mathematics.
At home (comfortable, relaxed, নিজের বাড়ির মতো আরামপ্রদ) I feel at home in your house.
At large (free, অবাধ, মুক্ত) The anti-socials are still at large. সমাজ বিরোধীরা এখনো ধরা ছোঁয়ার বাইরে
At large (as a whole, in general,সর্বোপরি, মোটকথা ) He is popular with the people at large.
At last/At long last (in the long run, finally, অবশেষে ) I got my missing book at last.
At least (at the lowest, অন্তত) At least one hundred boys will come to school today.
At fault/At a loss/At one's wits' end (puzzled, perplexed, bewildered, confused,হতবুদ্ধি, বিভ্রান্ত, কিংকর্তব্যবিমূঢ়) He was at fault/at a loss/at his wits' end and did not know what to do/say.
At one's discretion (according to one's decision/wishes-কারো সিদ্ধান্ত/মর্জি/ইচ্ছামাফিক) Bail is granted at the discretion of the court. (আদালতের স্বেচ্ছাধীন ক্ষমতায় জামিন মঞ্জুর হয়)

At one's own sweet will (according to his wishes, খুশি মতো ) He does it at his own sweet will.
At one's elbow (close at hand, পাশে, নিকটে) I am at your elbow in your all troubles.


At one's heels (close behind, পায়ে পায়ে) We followed him at his heels.
At one's finger ends/tips (ready at hand, নখদর্পণে) All these facts are at his finger ends.
At one's beck and call (obedient, under one's absolute control, আজ্ঞাবহ, ডাকলেই পাওয়া যায় এমন হুকুমের তাবেদার, অন্যের আদেশ পালনে প্রস্তুত ) He is always at my beck and call.
At random (aimlessly, indiscriminately, by chance, এলোপাথাড়িভাবে, এলোমেলোভাবে) He hit the ball at random. The police fired into the crowd at random. The winners will be chosen at random

At sixes and sevens (scattered, in disorder, in confusion, not well organized, বিশৃঙ্খলা অবস্থায়) All the furniture in the room were at sixes and sevens.
At stake (at risk, in danger, in jeopardy, বিপন্ন, ঝুঁকিপূর্ণ) His life is at stake now.
At sea (perplexed, confused, বিভ্রান্ত, হতবুদ্ধি, হাবুডুবু খাওয়া) I am quite at sea in English
At the eleventh hour (at the last possible moment/time, just in time, almost too late, শেষ মুহুর্তে) The doctor come to the patient at the eleventh hour.
At the outset (in the beginning, শুরুতেই) The marathon runner stumbled at the outset of the race
At times (occasionally, মাঝে মাঝে) At times he loses his temper. মাঝে মাঝে সে রেগে যায়।
Average person (common men, জনসাধারণ) An average person reads a book only for pleasure.

At cross purposes (misunderstanding each other and talking different subjects, কোন বিষয় না বুঝে পরস্পরকে ভুল বোঝাবুঝি অবস্থায় ভিন্ন বিষয়ে আলোচনা করা) They are arguing at a cross purposes.
At bay (in a tight corner,কোণঠাসা, প্রাণবাঁচানোর জন্য সংগ্রামরত) The tiger was at bay in the bush.
At daggers drawn (In a state of violent enmity/hostility, on the point of fighting,খড়গহস্ত,ঘোর বিবাদমান, চরম শত্রুতাপূর্ণ অবস্থা) The two brothers are now at daggers drawn.



At home (skilled, ; familiar with,খুব ভালো জ্ঞানসম্পন্ন) He is quite at home in Mathematics.
At home (comfortable, relaxed, নিজের বাড়ির মতো আরামপ্রদ) I feel at home in your house.
At large (free, অবাধ, মুক্ত) The anti-socials are still at large. সমাজ বিরোধীরা এখনো ধরা ছোঁয়ার বাইরে
At large (as a whole, in general,সর্বোপরি, মোটকথা ) He is popular with the people at large.
At last/At long last (in the long run, finally, অবশেষে ) I got my missing book at last.
At least (at the lowest, অন্তত) At least one hundred boys will come to school today.
At fault/At a loss/At one's wits' end (puzzled, perplexed, bewildered, confused,হতবুদ্ধি, বিভ্রান্ত, কিংকর্তব্যবিমূঢ়) He was at fault/at a loss/at his wits' end and did not know what to do/say.
At one's discretion (according to one's decision/wishes-কারো সিদ্ধান্ত/মর্জি/ইচ্ছামাফিক) Bail is granted at the discretion of the court. (আদালতের স্বেচ্ছাধীন ক্ষমতায় জামিন মঞ্জুর হয়)

At one's own sweet will (according to his wishes, খুশি মতো ) He does it at his own sweet will.
At one's elbow (close at hand, পাশে, নিকটে) I am at your elbow in your all troubles.


At one's heels (close behind, পায়ে পায়ে) We followed him at his heels.
At one's finger ends/tips (ready at hand, নখদর্পণে) All these facts are at his finger ends.
At one's beck and call (obedient, under one's absolute control, আজ্ঞাবহ, ডাকলেই পাওয়া যায় এমন হুকুমের তাবেদার, অন্যের আদেশ পালনে প্রস্তুত ) He is always at my beck and call.
At random (aimlessly, indiscriminately, by chance, এলোপাথাড়িভাবে, এলোমেলোভাবে) He hit the ball at random. The police fired into the crowd at random. The winners will be chosen at random

At sixes and sevens (scattered, in disorder, in confusion, not well organized, বিশৃঙ্খলা অবস্থায়) All the furniture in the room were at sixes and sevens.
At stake (at risk, in danger, in jeopardy, বিপন্ন, ঝুঁকিপূর্ণ) His life is at stake now.
At sea (perplexed, confused, বিভ্রান্ত, হতবুদ্ধি, হাবুডুবু খাওয়া) I am quite at sea in English
At the eleventh hour (at the last possible moment/time, just in time, almost too late, শেষ মুহুর্তে) The doctor come to the patient at the eleventh hour.
At the outset (in the beginning, শুরুতেই) The marathon runner stumbled at the outset of the race
At times (occasionally, মাঝে মাঝে) At times he loses his temper. মাঝে মাঝে সে রেগে যায়।
Average person (common men, জনসাধারণ) An average person reads a book only for pleasure.

subject: English
question: 'Achilles heel' means __
option_04: the fault which is small but can cause a person's fall
description:
Achilles heel = weak point = কোনো ব্যক্তির ছোটখাটো দুর্বলতা যা তার ব্যর্থতা/পতন/ধ্বংসের কারণ হতে পারে।

At home = familiar with, সুপরিচিত ; Expert/skilled-দক্ষ ; at ease, স্বচ্ছন্দে, সহজে শেখার ক্ষমতাসম্পন্ন

Some Important Idioms

ABC (primary/elementary knowledge, প্রাথমিক জ্ঞান) He doesn't know even the ABC of music

A bolt from the blue (something quite unexpected, an unexpected calamity, আকস্মিক ঘটনা, বিনা মেঘে বজ্রপাত) The news of his father's death came to him as a bolt from the blue.

Above board (honest and legal, ন্যায় ও বৈধ) His activities are open and above board.

Above all (more than anything else, সর্বোপরি) Above all, be careful of your health.
Achilles heel (small fault/weak point causing -- fall, ছোটখাটো কিন্তু পতন ঘটাতে পারে এমন দুর্বলতা) A misbehaving minister is regarded as a government's Achilles heel and is expected to resign

After all (in spite of everything, সব কিছু সত্ত্বেও) After all, he is a patriot.

All at once (suddenly, হঠাৎ) All at once a tiger came out of the forest.

All on (of) a sudden (suddenly,হঠাৎ) All on (of) a sudden a tiger came out of the bush.

All but (nearly, almost , প্রায়) The party was all but over when we arrived.

All in all (supreme, all powerful, সর্বেসর্বা, সর্বোচ্চ কর্তৃত্ববান) Mr Sen is all in all in his office.



All in a row (continuously, একটানা) I read ten of Dicken's all in a row.

Above one's means (beyond one's income, আয়ের অধিক ব্যয় করে জীবনযাপন করা) A scrupulous (বিবেক) person does not live above his/her means.

Above one's station (beyond one's ability etc, পদমর্যাদার বাইরে) He will try his best but the post is above his station.

Advanced in life (aged/old, বৃদ্ধ) Though he is not much advanced in life, he is experienced.

All and sundry (all people, সবাই, সকল) He invited all and sundry to his father's funeral.

All over with (ruined, সর্বস্বান্ত) It is all over with the old man.

Against the grain (beyond one's will, অনিচ্ছায়) He agreed with her to the proposal against the grain.

An apple of discord (matter of dispute, bone of contention, subject of quarrel, ঝগড়া/বিবাদের  কারণ) The paternal property has become an apple of discord between the two brothers.

As if (as it would be, যেন) He swims so beautifully as if he were the water-god.

As it were (like, যেন) The sun is, as it were, the lamp of the universe.



As a rule (usually, routinely, নিয়মমাফিক) He goes to bed at 10 p.m. as a rule.

As usual (habitually, usually, যথারীতি, বরাবরের মতো) He was late/ the last to arrive as usual.

As like as two peas in a pod (exactly alike, একই বৃন্তে দুটি ফুল) The friendship between the two boys are as like as two peas in a pod.

As the crow flies (direct,সোজাসুজি) The station is three miles away from here as the crow flies.

At a low ebb (declining, decreasing, falling, নিম্নমুখী, হ্রাসমান) His fame is at a low ebb now.

At a pinch (in case of emergency, জরুরি অবস্থায়) This amount will do at a pinch.

At a round rate (at the fixed price, নির্ধারিত মূল্যে) Things are selling in the shop at a round rate.

At a standstill (নিশ্চল, অচলাবস্থায়) The discussion is now at a standstill.

At a stretch (without break, with one effort, বিরতিহীনভাবে, একটানা) He can run ten miles at a stretch.

At all hazards (in the face of all difficulties, শত বাধাবিপত্তি সত্ত্বেও) I'll support your opinion at all hazards.


At any rate (at any cost, যেকোনো উপায়ে) she must come at any rate before 5 p.m.
At bottom (really, প্রকৃতপক্ষে; at the core,ভেতরে ভেতরে) Though he looks cruel, he is kind at bottom
At the bottom of (at the top of,শীর্ষে) The boy shouted at the bottom of his voice.
At dead of night (at midnight, গভীর রাতে)) The police caught the thief at dead of night. 

At all (primarily,আদৌ, মোটেই) He doesn't know French at all. He is not at all a good man.
At all events (in all cases,যাহাই ঘটুক সব ক্ষেত্রেই, সর্বাবস্থায়) I shall stand by him at all events.

At fault/At a loss/At one's wits' end (puzzled, perplexed, bewildered, confused,হতবুদ্ধি, বিভ্রান্ত, কিংকর্তব্যবিমূঢ়) He was at fault/at a loss/at his wits' end and did not know what to do/say.

subject: English
question: What does 'Abode of God' mean?

subject: English
question: 'To beg the question' means __
description:
beg the question = take for granted = কোনো বিষয়ের সত্যতা সম্পর্কে সন্দেহ থাকা সত্ত্বেও (অযৌক্তিকভাবে) সত্য বলে ধরে নেয়া; কোােন বিষয় সম্পর্কে না ভেবেই বা প্রথমে নিশ্চিত না হয়ে তা সত্য বলে বিশ্বাস করা।

Bad blood (ill feeling,মনোমালিন্য, তিক্ততা) Now there is bad blood between the two brothers.
Bad book (disfavour, কুনজর, অনুগ্রহহীনতা) The secretary has fallen in the bad book of the manager.
Bag and baggage (with all belongings, তল্পিতল্পাসহ) He left the place bag and baggage.
Bear away the palm (win, বিজয়ী হওয়া) I hope you will bear away the palm in the contest.
Beat about/around the bush (Talk irrelevantly, কাজের কথায় না এসে আজে বাজে কথা বলা) Robin has a habit of beating about the bush without coming the actual point at once.
Beat black and blue (beat severely/sorely, প্রচণ্ড প্রহার করা) John beat the thief black and blue.
Beat the air  (useless labour, বৃথা পরিশ্রম করা) In trying to defeat him, you are only beating the air.
Bed of roses (comfortable/easy condition, আরামদায়ক অবস্থা) Life is not a bed of roses.
Bed of thorns (hazardous situation, কন্টকাকীর্ণ স্থান, বিপজ্জনক পরিস্থিতি) Life is a bed of thorns.
Bear garden (a place of noise and quarrels, a place/scene of tumult and disorder, ঝগড়াটেদের আস্তানা) The members turned the meeting into a bear garden.



Beggar description (indescribable, অবর্ণনীয়) The beauty of the Taj is beggars description.

beneath  once dignity (derogatory, অসম্মানজনক) It is beneath my dignity to accept that post.
Between the devil and deep sea, Between two fires (between two equal dangers, in difficult situation,উভয় সঙ্কট ) I am between the devil and deep sea between my friends.
Bear away the bell (to be the first, সর্বপ্রথম হওয়া ) Will she be able to bear away the bell?
Bee line (straight away, সোজা পথ ) Our school is one mile away from here on the bee line.
Beauty sleep (premature sleep, প্রথম রাতের ঘুম ) The beautiful girl looks more beautiful in her beauty sleep.
Bellwether (leader, দলের নেতা ) The police could not arrest the ..... of the rebellious group.
Below the belt (adv. unlawfully, অন্যায়ভাবে; adj. unfair and cruel or hurtful অন্যায় ও নিষ্ঠুর) Never punish your younger brothers and sisters below the belt.
Beside the mark (irrelevant, অপ্রাসঙ্গিক) What he has written is beside the mark.
Bid one's time (wait for proper chance,সুযোগের অপেক্ষায় থাকা) They are biding their time to make the attack.


Big bug (important person,গুরুত্বপূর্ণ লোক) The chairman is a big bug of the union council.
Big wig  (famous person, খ্যাতনামা ব্যক্তি) We were invited to a lunch with local big wigs.
Bid fair (have the possibility of prospering, ভালো কিছু আশা করা) He bids fair to be a good doctor.
Big gun (a leading man, famous political person,নেতৃস্থানীয় ব্যক্তি ) He is a big gun of our locality.
Bill of fare {A menu (=list of dishes/food) in a restaurant,মূল্যসহ খাদ্যের তালিকা, ফুড মেনু} He took a seat in the corner and asked the waiter for the bill of fare.
Bird's eye view (a rough idea, মোটামুটি ধারণা; a cursory glance, ভাসাভাসা দৃষ্টি, একনজর দেখা) He took a bird's eye view of the flood-stricken area from an aeroplane.
Birds of a feather (person of similar nature, একরকম স্বভাবের লোক) Birds of a feather flock together
Black art (wizardry,যাদুবিদ্যা, ইন্দ্রজাল) Does she practice black art?
Black sheep (person of bed character, কুলাঙ্গার) He is a black sheep in his family.
Blue blood (Aristocracy, Aristocratic/noble birth) He is proud of his blue blood.



Blue ribbon (Highest honour in profession, সর্বোচ্চ পেশাগত সম্মান; অথবা, the highest prize in a competition/event) The office of the Prime minister is the blue ribbon in political life.
Blow hot and cold (both to praise and to blame at the same time,এক মুখে দুই কথা বলা) I cannot take you seriously, you blow hot and cold with same breath.
Born with a silver spoon (born rich, ধনাঢ্য পরিবারে জন্মগ্রহণ করা) He was born with a silver spoon
Book worm (one who always reads book only, গ্রন্থকীট, বই পাগল) Don't be a book worm.
Bosom friend (intimate friend, a very close friend, অন্তরঙ্গ বন্ধু) Salil is my bosom friend. )
Breathe one's last (die, মারা যাওয়া) The old man breathes his last on Sunday last.
Bone of contention (matter of dispute, subject of quarrel/disagreement, বিবাদের বিষয়) The paternal property is the bone of contention between the two brothers.
Bring to book (to punish, শাস্তি দেওয়া) He should be brought to book for his misconduct.
Bring to light (make open, disclose, প্রকাশ করা) The inquiry brought to light some startling facts.
Brown study (fit of reverie, day dream, দিবা স্বপ্ন) He is now absorbed in brown study.



Build castles in the air (indulge in idle vision, আকাশ কুসুম রচনা করা; make improbable plans, ঘটা প্রায় অসম্ভব এমন পরিকল্পনা করা ) Don't idle away your time in building castles in the air.
Burn the midnight oil (study till the late night,অধিক রাত্রি জেগে পড়াশুনা করা; work late into the night, অনেক রাত অবধি কাজ করা;) You will not have to burn midnight oil before examination.
Burning question (matter of strong debate, তীব্র বিতর্কের বিষয়) The problem of the dowry system is the burning question of the day.
By all means (in all possible ways,সর্বপ্রকারে, সর্ব উপায়ে) Try to do it by all means.
By and by (soon, before long, শীঘ্রই) He will come here by and by.
By and large (mostly, , mainly, প্রধানত) People in our village are by and large farmers.
By chance (by accident, দৈবাৎ, হঠাৎ, আকস্মিক) I met him on the way by chance.
By fits and starts (irregularly, অনিয়মিতভাবে, মাঝে মাঝে) He works by fits and starts.
By far (out and away, in all respects, সর্বাংশে ) He is by far the best boy in the class.
By the by (in course of talking, প্রসঙ্গক্রমে) By the by I came to know that he was ill.
By hook or by crook (by fair means or foul, by any method possible,বৈধ বা অবৈধ, যেকোনো সম্ভাব্য উপায়ে) You must do this work by hook or by crook.
By no means (in no way, not at all,কোনোভাবেই না, মোটেই না) I shall by no means call on him.
By/in leaps and bounds (very quickly/rapidly, খুব দ্রুতগতিতে) The population of Bangladesh is increasing by leaps and bounds.

subject: English
question: 'Weal and woe' come (সুখ এবং দুঃখ পালাক্রমে আসে)
description:
in a body – together, একসাথে; by and by- পরে; by the by– প্রসঙ্গক্রমে; by turns/in turn -পালাক্রমে

brush up = (পুরনো বিদ্যা, পূর্বে শেখা হয়েছে কিন্তু চর্চার অভাবে কিছুটা ভুলে যাওয়া হয়েছে এমন কিছু) ঝালিয়ে নেয়া

beg the question = take for granted = কোনো বিষয়ের সত্যতা সম্পর্কে সন্দেহ থাকা সত্ত্বেও (অযৌক্তিকভাবে) সত্য বলে ধরে নেয়া; কোােন বিষয় সম্পর্কে না ভেবেই বা প্রথমে নিশ্চিত না হয়ে তা সত্য বলে বিশ্বাস করা।

subject: English
question: 'Beat around the bush' means __
option_01: to walk in the bush for a long time.
option_02: to talk about something for a short time without coming to the main point.
option_03: to walk around the bush with the view to hunting doves
option_04: to talk about something for a long time without coming to the main point.
description:
Beat about/around the bush – আসল কথা বা গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বিষয় এড়িয়ে দীর্ঘক্ষণ ধরে বাজে বকা ।

A bull in a China shop = careless destroyer = পদ্মবনে মস্তহস্তী, চালচলে বেপরোয়া/অসতর্ক ব্যক্তি।

in a body – together, একসাথে; by and by- পরে; by the by– প্রসঙ্গক্রমে; by turns/in turn -পালাক্রমে


Bad blood (ill feeling,মনোমালিন্য, তিক্ততা) Now there is bad blood between the two brothers.
Bad book (disfavour, কুনজর, অনুগ্রহহীনতা) The secretary has fallen in the bad book of the manager.
Bag and baggage (with all belongings, তল্পিতল্পাসহ) He left the place bag and baggage.
Bear away the palm (win, বিজয়ী হওয়া) I hope you will bear away the palm in the contest.
Beat about/around the bush (Talk irrelevantly, কাজের কথায় না এসে আজে বাজে কথা বলা) Robin has a habit of beating about the bush without coming the actual point at once.
Beat black and blue (beat severely/sorely, প্রচণ্ড প্রহার করা) John beat the thief black and blue.
Beat the air  (useless labour, বৃথা পরিশ্রম করা) In trying to defeat him, you are only beating the air.
Bed of roses (comfortable/easy condition, আরামদায়ক অবস্থা) Life is not a bed of roses.
Bed of thorns (hazardous situation, কন্টকাকীর্ণ স্থান, বিপজ্জনক পরিস্থিতি) Life is a bed of thorns.
Bear garden (a place of noise and quarrels, a place/scene of tumult and disorder, ঝগড়াটেদের আস্তানা) The members turned the meeting into a bear garden.



Beggar description (indescribable, অবর্ণনীয়) The beauty of the Taj is beggars description.

beneath  once dignity (derogatory, অসম্মানজনক) It is beneath my dignity to accept that post.
Between the devil and deep sea, Between two fires (between two equal dangers, in difficult situation,উভয় সঙ্কট ) I am between the devil and deep sea between my friends.
Bear away the bell (to be the first, সর্বপ্রথম হওয়া ) Will she be able to bear away the bell?
Bee line (straight away, সোজা পথ ) Our school is one mile away from here on the bee line.
Beauty sleep (premature sleep, প্রথম রাতের ঘুম ) The beautiful girl looks more beautiful in her beauty sleep.
Bellwether (leader, দলের নেতা ) The police could not arrest the ..... of the rebellious group.
Below the belt (adv. unlawfully, অন্যায়ভাবে; adj. unfair and cruel or hurtful অন্যায় ও নিষ্ঠুর) Never punish your younger brothers and sisters below the belt.
Beside the mark (irrelevant, অপ্রাসঙ্গিক) What he has written is beside the mark.
Bid one's time (wait for proper chance,সুযোগের অপেক্ষায় থাকা) They are biding their time to make the attack.


Big bug (important person,গুরুত্বপূর্ণ লোক) The chairman is a big bug of the union council.
Big wig  (famous person, খ্যাতনামা ব্যক্তি) We were invited to a lunch with local big wigs.
Bid fair (have the possibility of prospering, ভালো কিছু আশা করা) He bids fair to be a good doctor.
Big gun (a leading man, famous political person,নেতৃস্থানীয় ব্যক্তি ) He is a big gun of our locality.
Bill of fare {A menu (=list of dishes/food) in a restaurant,মূল্যসহ খাদ্যের তালিকা, ফুড মেনু} He took a seat in the corner and asked the waiter for the bill of fare.
Bird's eye view (a rough idea, মোটামুটি ধারণা; a cursory glance, ভাসাভাসা দৃষ্টি, একনজর দেখা) He took a bird's eye view of the flood-stricken area from an aeroplane.
Birds of a feather (person of similar nature, একরকম স্বভাবের লোক) Birds of a feather flock together
Black art (wizardry,যাদুবিদ্যা, ইন্দ্রজাল) Does she practice black art?
Black sheep (person of bed character, কুলাঙ্গার) He is a black sheep in his family.
Blue blood (Aristocracy, Aristocratic/noble birth) He is proud of his blue blood.



Blue ribbon (Highest honour in profession, সর্বোচ্চ পেশাগত সম্মান; অথবা, the highest prize in a competition/event) The office of the Prime minister is the blue ribbon in political life.
Blow hot and cold (both to praise and to blame at the same time,এক মুখে দুই কথা বলা) I cannot take you seriously, you blow hot and cold with same breath.
Born with a silver spoon (born rich, ধনাঢ্য পরিবারে জন্মগ্রহণ করা) He was born with a silver spoon
Book worm (one who always reads book only, গ্রন্থকীট, বই পাগল) Don't be a book worm.
Bosom friend (intimate friend, a very close friend, অন্তরঙ্গ বন্ধু) Salil is my bosom friend. )
Breathe one's last (die, মারা যাওয়া) The old man breathes his last on Sunday last.
Bone of contention (matter of dispute, subject of quarrel/disagreement, বিবাদের বিষয়) The paternal property is the bone of contention between the two brothers.
Bring to book (to punish, শাস্তি দেওয়া) He should be brought to book for his misconduct.
Bring to light (make open, disclose, প্রকাশ করা) The inquiry brought to light some startling facts.
Brown study (fit of reverie, day dream, দিবা স্বপ্ন) He is now absorbed in brown study.



Build castles in the air (indulge in idle vision, আকাশ কুসুম রচনা করা; make improbable plans, ঘটা প্রায় অসম্ভব এমন পরিকল্পনা করা ) Don't idle away your time in building castles in the air.
Burn the midnight oil (study till the late night,অধিক রাত্রি জেগে পড়াশুনা করা; work late into the night, অনেক রাত অবধি কাজ করা;) You will not have to burn midnight oil before examination.
Burning question (matter of strong debate, তীব্র বিতর্কের বিষয়) The problem of the dowry system is the burning question of the day.
By all means (in all possible ways,সর্বপ্রকারে, সর্ব উপায়ে) Try to do it by all means.
By and by (soon, before long, শীঘ্রই) He will come here by and by.
By and large (mostly, , mainly, প্রধানত) People in our village are by and large farmers.
By chance (by accident, দৈবাৎ, হঠাৎ, আকস্মিক) I met him on the way by chance.
By fits and starts (irregularly, অনিয়মিতভাবে, মাঝে মাঝে) He works by fits and starts.
By far (out and away, in all respects, সর্বাংশে ) He is by far the best boy in the class.
By the by (in course of talking, প্রসঙ্গক্রমে) By the by I came to know that he was ill.
By hook or by crook (by fair means or foul, by any method possible,বৈধ বা অবৈধ, যেকোনো সম্ভাব্য উপায়ে) You must do this work by hook or by crook.
By no means (in no way, not at all,কোনোভাবেই না, মোটেই না) I shall by no means call on him.
By/in leaps and bounds (very quickly/rapidly, খুব দ্রুতগতিতে) The population of Bangladesh is increasing by leaps and bounds.

subject: English
question: Those customers are - the most demanding we've ever had.
description:
So far - until now- এখন পর্যন্ত। So far শুধু present perfect tense এ বাক্যের প্রথমে অথবা বাক্যের শেষে ব্যবহৃত হয়| He has played for his club in 65 matches so far. By far = by a great amount, অনেকাংশে, নিঃসন্দেহে, তুলনায় এগিয়ে। কেবলমাত্র the + superlative form এর পূর্বে by far বসে।

Bear away the bell (to be the first, সর্বপ্রথম হওয়া ) Will she be able to bear away the bell?
Bee line (straight away, সোজা পথ ) Our school is one mile away from here on the bee line.
Beauty sleep (premature sleep, প্রথম রাতের ঘুম ) The beautiful girl looks more beautiful in her beauty sleep.
Bellwether (leader, দলের নেতা ) The police could not arrest the ..... of the rebellious group.
Below the belt (adv. unlawfully, অন্যায়ভাবে; adj. unfair and cruel or hurtful অন্যায় ও নিষ্ঠুর) Never punish your younger brothers and sisters below the belt.
Beside the mark (irrelevant, অপ্রাসঙ্গিক) What he has written is beside the mark.
Bid one's time (wait for proper chance,সুযোগের অপেক্ষায় থাকা) They are biding their time to make the attack.


Big bug (important person,গুরুত্বপূর্ণ লোক) The chairman is a big bug of the union council.
Big wig  (famous person, খ্যাতনামা ব্যক্তি) We were invited to a lunch with local big wigs.
Bid fair (have the possibility of prospering, ভালো কিছু আশা করা) He bids fair to be a good doctor.
Big gun (a leading man, famous political person,নেতৃস্থানীয় ব্যক্তি ) He is a big gun of our locality.
Bill of fare {A menu (=list of dishes/food) in a restaurant,মূল্যসহ খাদ্যের তালিকা, ফুড মেনু} He took a seat in the corner and asked the waiter for the bill of fare.
Bird's eye view (a rough idea, মোটামুটি ধারণা; a cursory glance, ভাসাভাসা দৃষ্টি, একনজর দেখা) He took a bird's eye view of the flood-stricken area from an aeroplane.
Birds of a feather (person of similar nature, একরকম স্বভাবের লোক) Birds of a feather flock together
Black art (wizardry,যাদুবিদ্যা, ইন্দ্রজাল) Does she practice black art?
Black sheep (person of bed character, কুলাঙ্গার) He is a black sheep in his family.
Blue blood (Aristocracy, Aristocratic/noble birth) He is proud of his blue blood.



Blue ribbon (Highest honour in profession, সর্বোচ্চ পেশাগত সম্মান; অথবা, the highest prize in a competition/event) The office of the Prime minister is the blue ribbon in political life.
Blow hot and cold (both to praise and to blame at the same time,এক মুখে দুই কথা বলা) I cannot take you seriously, you blow hot and cold with same breath.
Born with a silver spoon (born rich, ধনাঢ্য পরিবারে জন্মগ্রহণ করা) He was born with a silver spoon
Book worm (one who always reads book only, গ্রন্থকীট, বই পাগল) Don't be a book worm.
Bosom friend (intimate friend, a very close friend, অন্তরঙ্গ বন্ধু) Salil is my bosom friend. )
Breathe one's last (die, মারা যাওয়া) The old man breathes his last on Sunday last.
Bone of contention (matter of dispute, subject of quarrel/disagreement, বিবাদের বিষয়) The paternal property is the bone of contention between the two brothers.
Bring to book (to punish, শাস্তি দেওয়া) He should be brought to book for his misconduct.
Bring to light (make open, disclose, প্রকাশ করা) The inquiry brought to light some startling facts.
Brown study (fit of reverie, day dream, দিবা স্বপ্ন) He is now absorbed in brown study.



Build castles in the air (indulge in idle vision, আকাশ কুসুম রচনা করা; make improbable plans, ঘটা প্রায় অসম্ভব এমন পরিকল্পনা করা ) Don't idle away your time in building castles in the air.
Burn the midnight oil (study till the late night,অধিক রাত্রি জেগে পড়াশুনা করা; work late into the night, অনেক রাত অবধি কাজ করা;) You will not have to burn midnight oil before examination.
Burning question (matter of strong debate, তীব্র বিতর্কের বিষয়) The problem of the dowry system is the burning question of the day.
By all means (in all possible ways,সর্বপ্রকারে, সর্ব উপায়ে) Try to do it by all means.
By and by (soon, before long, শীঘ্রই) He will come here by and by.
By and large (mostly, , mainly, প্রধানত) People in our village are by and large farmers.
By chance (by accident, দৈবাৎ, হঠাৎ, আকস্মিক) I met him on the way by chance.
By fits and starts (irregularly, অনিয়মিতভাবে, মাঝে মাঝে) He works by fits and starts.
By far (out and away, in all respects, সর্বাংশে ) He is by far the best boy in the class.
By the by (in course of talking, প্রসঙ্গক্রমে) By the by I came to know that he was ill.
By hook or by crook (by fair means or foul, by any method possible,বৈধ বা অবৈধ, যেকোনো সম্ভাব্য উপায়ে) You must do this work by hook or by crook.
By no means (in no way, not at all,কোনোভাবেই না, মোটেই না) I shall by no means call on him.
By/in leaps and bounds (very quickly/rapidly, খুব দ্রুতগতিতে) The population of Bangladesh is increasing by leaps and bounds.

subject: English
question: Black and blue এর অর্থ কি?
description:
Beat black and blue = beat severely = মেরে কালশিরা ফেলা, বেদম প্রহার করা, খুব উত্তম মধ্যম দেওয়া।

A birdbrain = a fool, a blockhead, a numbskull, a stupid person = নির্বোধ ব্যক্তি ।

By and large = Mostly, mainly প্রধানত, মূলত ; Be that as it may = However, সে যাহাই হোক ।

smuggle Bootleg = smuggle = চোরাকারবার করা, মূলত শুল্ক ফাঁকি দিয়ে/বেআইনীভাবে কোনো কিছু উৎপাদন ও বিক্রি করা।

Brown study (fit of reverie, day dream, দিবা স্বপ্ন) He is now absorbed in brown study.

By fits and starts (irregularly, অনিয়মিতভাবে, মাঝে মাঝে) He works by fits and starts.
By far (out and away, in all respects, সর্বাংশে ) He is by far the best boy in the class.
By the by (in course of talking, প্রসঙ্গক্রমে) By the by I came to know that he was ill.
By hook or by crook (by fair means or foul, by any method possible,বৈধ বা অবৈধ, যেকোনো সম্ভাব্য উপায়ে) You must do this work by hook or by crook.
By no means (in no way, not at all,কোনোভাবেই না, মোটেই না) I shall by no means call on him.
By/in leaps and bounds (very quickly/rapidly, খুব দ্রুতগতিতে) The population of Bangladesh is increasing by leaps and bounds.

subject: English
question: A "burning question" means -
description:
Burning question/issue = Much talked about, A hotly discussed question, a very important and urgent problem = ব্যাপকভাবে আলোচিত ও প্রচণ্ডভাবে বিতর্কিত, খুব গুরুত্বপূর্ণ এবং জরুরি (বিষয়/সমস্যা)।

Burn the candle at both ends = অপচয় করা; অনেক বেশি/খুব কঠিন কাজ করে অত্যন্ত নিঃশেষিত/ক্লান্ত হওয়া ।

By fits and starts = irregularly অনিয়মিতভাবে, at irregular intervals মাঝে মাঝে উৎসাহ দেখিয়ে

Bury the hatchet = patch up dispute, ঝগড়া মিটিয়ে ফেলা এবং পূর্বের ন্যায় বন্ধু হওয়া, শান্তি স্থাপন করা ।

by/in leaps and bounds - At rapid rates, rapidly, very quickly

judge a book by its cover-কোনো ব্যক্তি বা বস্তুর বাহ্যিক চেহারা দেখে বিচার করা, মূল্যায়ন করা, রায়/মত দেয়া ।

Beat black and blue = beat severely = মেরে কালশিরা ফেলা, বেদম প্রহার করা, খুব উত্তম মধ্যম দেওয়া।

A birdbrain = a fool, a blockhead, a numbskull, a stupid person = নির্বোধ ব্যক্তি ।

By and large = Mostly, mainly প্রধানত, মূলত ; Be that as it may = However, সে যাহাই হোক ।

smuggle Bootleg = smuggle = চোরাকারবার করা, মূলত শুল্ক ফাঁকি দিয়ে/বেআইনীভাবে কোনো কিছু উৎপাদন ও বিক্রি করা।

Bear market হচ্ছে মন্দা বাজার অর্থাৎ যখন শেয়ারের দাম কমে যায়। Bearish = a falling price, মূল্য পতন ।

rising Bull market হচ্ছে তেজী বাজার অর্থাৎ যখন শেয়ারের দাম বেড়ে যায় । Bullish = a rising price, মূল্য বৃদ্ধি

Beat about/around the bush – আসল কথা বা গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বিষয় এড়িয়ে দীর্ঘক্ষণ ধরে বাজে বকা ।

A bull in a China shop = careless destroyer = পদ্মবনে মস্তহস্তী, চালচলে বেপরোয়া/অসতর্ক ব্যক্তি।

in a body – together, একসাথে; by and by- পরে; by the by– প্রসঙ্গক্রমে; by turns/in turn -পালাক্রমে


Bad blood (ill feeling,মনোমালিন্য, তিক্ততা) Now there is bad blood between the two brothers.
Bad book (disfavour, কুনজর, অনুগ্রহহীনতা) The secretary has fallen in the bad book of the manager.
Bag and baggage (with all belongings, তল্পিতল্পাসহ) He left the place bag and baggage.
Bear away the palm (win, বিজয়ী হওয়া) I hope you will bear away the palm in the contest.
Beat about/around the bush (Talk irrelevantly, কাজের কথায় না এসে আজে বাজে কথা বলা) Robin has a habit of beating about the bush without coming the actual point at once.
Beat black and blue (beat severely/sorely, প্রচণ্ড প্রহার করা) John beat the thief black and blue.
Beat the air  (useless labour, বৃথা পরিশ্রম করা) In trying to defeat him, you are only beating the air.
Bed of roses (comfortable/easy condition, আরামদায়ক অবস্থা) Life is not a bed of roses.
Bed of thorns (hazardous situation, কন্টকাকীর্ণ স্থান, বিপজ্জনক পরিস্থিতি) Life is a bed of thorns.
Bear garden (a place of noise and quarrels, a place/scene of tumult and disorder, ঝগড়াটেদের আস্তানা) The members turned the meeting into a bear garden.



Beggar description (indescribable, অবর্ণনীয়) The beauty of the Taj is beggars description.

beneath  once dignity (derogatory, অসম্মানজনক) It is beneath my dignity to accept that post.
Between the devil and deep sea, Between two fires (between two equal dangers, in difficult situation,উভয় সঙ্কট ) I am between the devil and deep sea between my friends.
Bear away the bell (to be the first, সর্বপ্রথম হওয়া ) Will she be able to bear away the bell?
Bee line (straight away, সোজা পথ ) Our school is one mile away from here on the bee line.
Beauty sleep (premature sleep, প্রথম রাতের ঘুম ) The beautiful girl looks more beautiful in her beauty sleep.
Bellwether (leader, দলের নেতা ) The police could not arrest the ..... of the rebellious group.
Below the belt (adv. unlawfully, অন্যায়ভাবে; adj. unfair and cruel or hurtful অন্যায় ও নিষ্ঠুর) Never punish your younger brothers and sisters below the belt.
Beside the mark (irrelevant, অপ্রাসঙ্গিক) What he has written is beside the mark.
Bid one's time (wait for proper chance,সুযোগের অপেক্ষায় থাকা) They are biding their time to make the attack.


Big bug (important person,গুরুত্বপূর্ণ লোক) The chairman is a big bug of the union council.
Big wig  (famous person, খ্যাতনামা ব্যক্তি) We were invited to a lunch with local big wigs.
Bid fair (have the possibility of prospering, ভালো কিছু আশা করা) He bids fair to be a good doctor.
Big gun (a leading man, famous political person,নেতৃস্থানীয় ব্যক্তি ) He is a big gun of our locality.
Bill of fare {A menu (=list of dishes/food) in a restaurant,মূল্যসহ খাদ্যের তালিকা, ফুড মেনু} He took a seat in the corner and asked the waiter for the bill of fare.
Bird's eye view (a rough idea, মোটামুটি ধারণা; a cursory glance, ভাসাভাসা দৃষ্টি, একনজর দেখা) He took a bird's eye view of the flood-stricken area from an aeroplane.
Birds of a feather (person of similar nature, একরকম স্বভাবের লোক) Birds of a feather flock together
Black art (wizardry,যাদুবিদ্যা, ইন্দ্রজাল) Does she practice black art?
Black sheep (person of bed character, কুলাঙ্গার) He is a black sheep in his family.
Blue blood (Aristocracy, Aristocratic/noble birth) He is proud of his blue blood.



Blue ribbon (Highest honour in profession, সর্বোচ্চ পেশাগত সম্মান; অথবা, the highest prize in a competition/event) The office of the Prime minister is the blue ribbon in political life.
Blow hot and cold (both to praise and to blame at the same time,এক মুখে দুই কথা বলা) I cannot take you seriously, you blow hot and cold with same breath.
Born with a silver spoon (born rich, ধনাঢ্য পরিবারে জন্মগ্রহণ করা) He was born with a silver spoon
Book worm (one who always reads book only, গ্রন্থকীট, বই পাগল) Don't be a book worm.
Bosom friend (intimate friend, a very close friend, অন্তরঙ্গ বন্ধু) Salil is my bosom friend. )
Breathe one's last (die, মারা যাওয়া) The old man breathes his last on Sunday last.
Bone of contention (matter of dispute, subject of quarrel/disagreement, বিবাদের বিষয়) The paternal property is the bone of contention between the two brothers.
Bring to book (to punish, শাস্তি দেওয়া) He should be brought to book for his misconduct.
Bring to light (make open, disclose, প্রকাশ করা) The inquiry brought to light some startling facts.
Brown study (fit of reverie, day dream, দিবা স্বপ্ন) He is now absorbed in brown study.



Build castles in the air (indulge in idle vision, আকাশ কুসুম রচনা করা; make improbable plans, ঘটা প্রায় অসম্ভব এমন পরিকল্পনা করা ) Don't idle away your time in building castles in the air.
Burn the midnight oil (study till the late night,অধিক রাত্রি জেগে পড়াশুনা করা; work late into the night, অনেক রাত অবধি কাজ করা;) You will not have to burn midnight oil before examination.
Burning question (matter of strong debate, তীব্র বিতর্কের বিষয়) The problem of the dowry system is the burning question of the day.
By all means (in all possible ways,সর্বপ্রকারে, সর্ব উপায়ে) Try to do it by all means.
By and by (soon, before long, শীঘ্রই) He will come here by and by.
By and large (mostly, , mainly, প্রধানত) People in our village are by and large farmers.
By chance (by accident, দৈবাৎ, হঠাৎ, আকস্মিক) I met him on the way by chance.
By fits and starts (irregularly, অনিয়মিতভাবে, মাঝে মাঝে) He works by fits and starts.
By far (out and away, in all respects, সর্বাংশে ) He is by far the best boy in the class.
By the by (in course of talking, প্রসঙ্গক্রমে) By the by I came to know that he was ill.
By hook or by crook (by fair means or foul, by any method possible,বৈধ বা অবৈধ, যেকোনো সম্ভাব্য উপায়ে) You must do this work by hook or by crook.
By no means (in no way, not at all,কোনোভাবেই না, মোটেই না) I shall by no means call on him.
By/in leaps and bounds (very quickly/rapidly, খুব দ্রুতগতিতে) The population of Bangladesh is increasing by leaps and bounds.

Burn the midnight oil (study till the late night,অধিক রাত্রি জেগে পড়াশুনা করা; work late into the night, অনেক রাত অবধি কাজ করা;) You will not have to burn midnight oil before examination.
Burning question (matter of strong debate, তীব্র বিতর্কের বিষয়) The problem of the dowry system is the burning question of the day.
By all means (in all possible ways,সর্বপ্রকারে, সর্ব উপায়ে) Try to do it by all means.
By and by (soon, before long, শীঘ্রই) He will come here by and by.
By and large (mostly, , mainly, প্রধানত) People in our village are by and large farmers.
By chance (by accident, দৈবাৎ, হঠাৎ, আকস্মিক) I met him on the way by chance.
By fits and starts (irregularly, অনিয়মিতভাবে, মাঝে মাঝে) He works by fits and starts.
By far (out and away, in all respects, সর্বাংশে ) He is by far the best boy in the class.
By the by (in course of talking, প্রসঙ্গক্রমে) By the by I came to know that he was ill.
By hook or by crook (by fair means or foul, by any method possible,বৈধ বা অবৈধ, যেকোনো সম্ভাব্য উপায়ে) You must do this work by hook or by crook.
By no means (in no way, not at all,কোনোভাবেই না, মোটেই না) I shall by no means call on him.
By/in leaps and bounds (very quickly/rapidly, খুব দ্রুতগতিতে) The population of Bangladesh is increasing by leaps and bounds.

subject: English
question: Choose the meaning of 'bring to pass'
description:
Bring to pass = cause to happen = কোনো কিছু ঘটার কারণ হওয়া, কোনো কিছু ঘটানো ।

Burning question/issue = Much talked about, A hotly discussed question, a very important and urgent problem = ব্যাপকভাবে আলোচিত ও প্রচণ্ডভাবে বিতর্কিত, খুব গুরুত্বপূর্ণ এবং জরুরি (বিষয়/সমস্যা)।

Burn the candle at both ends = অপচয় করা; অনেক বেশি/খুব কঠিন কাজ করে অত্যন্ত নিঃশেষিত/ক্লান্ত হওয়া ।

By fits and starts = irregularly অনিয়মিতভাবে, at irregular intervals মাঝে মাঝে উৎসাহ দেখিয়ে

Bury the hatchet = patch up dispute, ঝগড়া মিটিয়ে ফেলা এবং পূর্বের ন্যায় বন্ধু হওয়া, শান্তি স্থাপন করা ।

by/in leaps and bounds - At rapid rates, rapidly, very quickly

judge a book by its cover-কোনো ব্যক্তি বা বস্তুর বাহ্যিক চেহারা দেখে বিচার করা, মূল্যায়ন করা, রায়/মত দেয়া ।

Beat black and blue = beat severely = মেরে কালশিরা ফেলা, বেদম প্রহার করা, খুব উত্তম মধ্যম দেওয়া।

A birdbrain = a fool, a blockhead, a numbskull, a stupid person = নির্বোধ ব্যক্তি ।

By and large = Mostly, mainly প্রধানত, মূলত ; Be that as it may = However, সে যাহাই হোক ।

smuggle Bootleg = smuggle = চোরাকারবার করা, মূলত শুল্ক ফাঁকি দিয়ে/বেআইনীভাবে কোনো কিছু উৎপাদন ও বিক্রি করা।

Bear market হচ্ছে মন্দা বাজার অর্থাৎ যখন শেয়ারের দাম কমে যায়। Bearish = a falling price, মূল্য পতন ।

rising Bull market হচ্ছে তেজী বাজার অর্থাৎ যখন শেয়ারের দাম বেড়ে যায় । Bullish = a rising price, মূল্য বৃদ্ধি

Beat about/around the bush – আসল কথা বা গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বিষয় এড়িয়ে দীর্ঘক্ষণ ধরে বাজে বকা ।

A bull in a China shop = careless destroyer = পদ্মবনে মস্তহস্তী, চালচলে বেপরোয়া/অসতর্ক ব্যক্তি।

in a body – together, একসাথে; by and by- পরে; by the by– প্রসঙ্গক্রমে; by turns/in turn -পালাক্রমে


Bad blood (ill feeling,মনোমালিন্য, তিক্ততা) Now there is bad blood between the two brothers.
Bad book (disfavour, কুনজর, অনুগ্রহহীনতা) The secretary has fallen in the bad book of the manager.
Bag and baggage (with all belongings, তল্পিতল্পাসহ) He left the place bag and baggage.
Bear away the palm (win, বিজয়ী হওয়া) I hope you will bear away the palm in the contest.
Beat about/around the bush (Talk irrelevantly, কাজের কথায় না এসে আজে বাজে কথা বলা) Robin has a habit of beating about the bush without coming the actual point at once.
Beat black and blue (beat severely/sorely, প্রচণ্ড প্রহার করা) John beat the thief black and blue.
Beat the air  (useless labour, বৃথা পরিশ্রম করা) In trying to defeat him, you are only beating the air.
Bed of roses (comfortable/easy condition, আরামদায়ক অবস্থা) Life is not a bed of roses.
Bed of thorns (hazardous situation, কন্টকাকীর্ণ স্থান, বিপজ্জনক পরিস্থিতি) Life is a bed of thorns.
Bear garden (a place of noise and quarrels, a place/scene of tumult and disorder, ঝগড়াটেদের আস্তানা) The members turned the meeting into a bear garden.



Beggar description (indescribable, অবর্ণনীয়) The beauty of the Taj is beggars description.

beneath  once dignity (derogatory, অসম্মানজনক) It is beneath my dignity to accept that post.
Between the devil and deep sea, Between two fires (between two equal dangers, in difficult situation,উভয় সঙ্কট ) I am between the devil and deep sea between my friends.
Bear away the bell (to be the first, সর্বপ্রথম হওয়া ) Will she be able to bear away the bell?
Bee line (straight away, সোজা পথ ) Our school is one mile away from here on the bee line.
Beauty sleep (premature sleep, প্রথম রাতের ঘুম ) The beautiful girl looks more beautiful in her beauty sleep.
Bellwether (leader, দলের নেতা ) The police could not arrest the ..... of the rebellious group.
Below the belt (adv. unlawfully, অন্যায়ভাবে; adj. unfair and cruel or hurtful অন্যায় ও নিষ্ঠুর) Never punish your younger brothers and sisters below the belt.
Beside the mark (irrelevant, অপ্রাসঙ্গিক) What he has written is beside the mark.
Bid one's time (wait for proper chance,সুযোগের অপেক্ষায় থাকা) They are biding their time to make the attack.

Bird's eye view (a rough idea, মোটামুটি ধারণা; a cursory glance, ভাসাভাসা দৃষ্টি, একনজর দেখা) He took a bird's eye view of the flood-stricken area from an aeroplane.

Black sheep (person of bed character, কুলাঙ্গার) He is a black sheep in his family.

Blue ribbon (Highest honour in profession, সর্বোচ্চ পেশাগত সম্মান; অথবা, the highest prize in a competition/event) The office of the Prime minister is the blue ribbon in political life.

subject: English
question: A best seller means __
option_04: a book that sells in very large number
description:
A best seller = যে বই অত্যন্ত জনপ্রিয় এবং ব্যাপক পরিমাণে বিক্রি হয়, বিক্রি বা কাটতির দিক দিয়ে বছরের সেরা বই।

Bill of fare = A list of dishes at a restaurant = হোটেল, রেস্টুরেন্ট ইত্যাদিতে মূল্যসমেত খাদ্যতালিকা ।


Bad blood (ill feeling,মনোমালিন্য, তিক্ততা) Now there is bad blood between the two brothers.
Bad book (disfavour, কুনজর, অনুগ্রহহীনতা) The secretary has fallen in the bad book of the manager.
Bag and baggage (with all belongings, তল্পিতল্পাসহ) He left the place bag and baggage.
Bear away the palm (win, বিজয়ী হওয়া) I hope you will bear away the palm in the contest.
Beat about/around the bush (Talk irrelevantly, কাজের কথায় না এসে আজে বাজে কথা বলা) Robin has a habit of beating about the bush without coming the actual point at once.
Beat black and blue (beat severely/sorely, প্রচণ্ড প্রহার করা) John beat the thief black and blue.
Beat the air  (useless labour, বৃথা পরিশ্রম করা) In trying to defeat him, you are only beating the air.
Bed of roses (comfortable/easy condition, আরামদায়ক অবস্থা) Life is not a bed of roses.
Bed of thorns (hazardous situation, কন্টকাকীর্ণ স্থান, বিপজ্জনক পরিস্থিতি) Life is a bed of thorns.
Bear garden (a place of noise and quarrels, a place/scene of tumult and disorder, ঝগড়াটেদের আস্তানা) The members turned the meeting into a bear garden.



Beggar description (indescribable, অবর্ণনীয়) The beauty of the Taj is beggars description.

beneath  once dignity (derogatory, অসম্মানজনক) It is beneath my dignity to accept that post.
Between the devil and deep sea, Between two fires (between two equal dangers, in difficult situation,উভয় সঙ্কট ) I am between the devil and deep sea between my friends.
Bear away the bell (to be the first, সর্বপ্রথম হওয়া ) Will she be able to bear away the bell?
Bee line (straight away, সোজা পথ ) Our school is one mile away from here on the bee line.
Beauty sleep (premature sleep, প্রথম রাতের ঘুম ) The beautiful girl looks more beautiful in her beauty sleep.
Bellwether (leader, দলের নেতা ) The police could not arrest the ..... of the rebellious group.
Below the belt (adv. unlawfully, অন্যায়ভাবে; adj. unfair and cruel or hurtful অন্যায় ও নিষ্ঠুর) Never punish your younger brothers and sisters below the belt.
Beside the mark (irrelevant, অপ্রাসঙ্গিক) What he has written is beside the mark.
Bid one's time (wait for proper chance,সুযোগের অপেক্ষায় থাকা) They are biding their time to make the attack.


Big bug (important person,গুরুত্বপূর্ণ লোক) The chairman is a big bug of the union council.
Big wig  (famous person, খ্যাতনামা ব্যক্তি) We were invited to a lunch with local big wigs.
Bid fair (have the possibility of prospering, ভালো কিছু আশা করা) He bids fair to be a good doctor.
Big gun (a leading man, famous political person,নেতৃস্থানীয় ব্যক্তি ) He is a big gun of our locality.
Bill of fare {A menu (=list of dishes/food) in a restaurant,মূল্যসহ খাদ্যের তালিকা, ফুড মেনু} He took a seat in the corner and asked the waiter for the bill of fare.
Bird's eye view (a rough idea, মোটামুটি ধারণা; a cursory glance, ভাসাভাসা দৃষ্টি, একনজর দেখা) He took a bird's eye view of the flood-stricken area from an aeroplane.
Birds of a feather (person of similar nature, একরকম স্বভাবের লোক) Birds of a feather flock together
Black art (wizardry,যাদুবিদ্যা, ইন্দ্রজাল) Does she practice black art?
Black sheep (person of bed character, কুলাঙ্গার) He is a black sheep in his family.
Blue blood (Aristocracy, Aristocratic/noble birth) He is proud of his blue blood.



Blue ribbon (Highest honour in profession, সর্বোচ্চ পেশাগত সম্মান; অথবা, the highest prize in a competition/event) The office of the Prime minister is the blue ribbon in political life.
Blow hot and cold (both to praise and to blame at the same time,এক মুখে দুই কথা বলা) I cannot take you seriously, you blow hot and cold with same breath.
Born with a silver spoon (born rich, ধনাঢ্য পরিবারে জন্মগ্রহণ করা) He was born with a silver spoon
Book worm (one who always reads book only, গ্রন্থকীট, বই পাগল) Don't be a book worm.
Bosom friend (intimate friend, a very close friend, অন্তরঙ্গ বন্ধু) Salil is my bosom friend. )
Breathe one's last (die, মারা যাওয়া) The old man breathes his last on Sunday last.
Bone of contention (matter of dispute, subject of quarrel/disagreement, বিবাদের বিষয়) The paternal property is the bone of contention between the two brothers.
Bring to book (to punish, শাস্তি দেওয়া) He should be brought to book for his misconduct.
Bring to light (make open, disclose, প্রকাশ করা) The inquiry brought to light some startling facts.
Brown study (fit of reverie, day dream, দিবা স্বপ্ন) He is now absorbed in brown study.



Build castles in the air (indulge in idle vision, আকাশ কুসুম রচনা করা; make improbable plans, ঘটা প্রায় অসম্ভব এমন পরিকল্পনা করা ) Don't idle away your time in building castles in the air.
Burn the midnight oil (study till the late night,অধিক রাত্রি জেগে পড়াশুনা করা; work late into the night, অনেক রাত অবধি কাজ করা;) You will not have to burn midnight oil before examination.
Burning question (matter of strong debate, তীব্র বিতর্কের বিষয়) The problem of the dowry system is the burning question of the day.
By all means (in all possible ways,সর্বপ্রকারে, সর্ব উপায়ে) Try to do it by all means.
By and by (soon, before long, শীঘ্রই) He will come here by and by.
By and large (mostly, , mainly, প্রধানত) People in our village are by and large farmers.
By chance (by accident, দৈবাৎ, হঠাৎ, আকস্মিক) I met him on the way by chance.
By fits and starts (irregularly, অনিয়মিতভাবে, মাঝে মাঝে) He works by fits and starts.
By far (out and away, in all respects, সর্বাংশে ) He is by far the best boy in the class.
By the by (in course of talking, প্রসঙ্গক্রমে) By the by I came to know that he was ill.
By hook or by crook (by fair means or foul, by any method possible,বৈধ বা অবৈধ, যেকোনো সম্ভাব্য উপায়ে) You must do this work by hook or by crook.
By no means (in no way, not at all,কোনোভাবেই না, মোটেই না) I shall by no means call on him.
By/in leaps and bounds (very quickly/rapidly, খুব দ্রুতগতিতে) The population of Bangladesh is increasing by leaps and bounds.

subject: English
question: Find out the best translation of the sentence, 'There is a black sheep in every family'.
option_01: প্রতিটি ভেড়ার দলে একটি করে কালো ভেড়া থাকে।
option_02: প্রতিটি পরিবারে একজন করে কুলাঙ্গার থাকে ।
option_03: প্রতিটি পরিবারে একটি করে কালো ভেড়া থাকে ।
option_04: প্রতিটি পরিবারে একজন করে কালো মানুষ থাকে ।
